nodes.text: A series of riots took place in the Old Market Sector on the planet Coruscant during the reign of the Galactic Empire. The riots resulted in the Mon Calamari residents of Coruscant being "relocated" by the Empire, with some leaving behind some of their belongings as they were moved. One such possession left behind was a B-14 airspeeder, which was taken by a resident of Level 3204 and given to his daughter.
The Old Sector riots were first mentioned in "One Thousand Levels Down", a short story written by Alexander Freed and published in Star Wars Insider 151 in 2014.
